card.note: The thing I like best about you Dad is your love and dedication to your family. Whether it's a phone call, email, or card - your efforts are appreciated.
card.author: Nicole

card.note: His big smile, fancy cars and love of dogs! Love you Harris! Happy Father's Day!
card.author: Heather Rem

card.note: Harris is a fabulous story teller and collector. He has always been kind and loving to me and to Emma. We both adore him and wish him a wonderful Father's Day!/R
card.author: Susan Reilly

card.note: The manner in which Harris relates to people. He has his opinions, but he never puts another person down for one's differing opinion.
card.author: Irv Rem

card.note: A very welcoming and generous man who puts the needs of others before his own.
card.author: Patrick Reilly

card.note: Hmmm!! I think it would be our almost 30 year friendship. We have watched our kids get married, birth of grandkids, good times and sad times, but we were always there for each other, even when I got a crime file thrown at me! xoxoxo
card.author: Cheryl

card.note: I love how Harris dares to be himself. He knows how to make others around him feel special. If it's cutting out an article that made him think of you or wearing pink socks with matching underwear, he'll get a smile out of you.
card.author: Justin Schneir

card.note: Although I only worked with you for a short time, I have marveled at your relationships with your client/friends. You have instilled such a high level of care and trust in the 30+ years you have served as their "Trusted Advisor". You will be sorely missed by them and me
card.author: Paul Roth

card.note: One thing I liked most about Harris was that he always stopped by my office to say hi! It gets pretty quiet on our end of the office, so his smile and stories were always welcome!
card.author: Susie Nicastro (Olid)

card.note: Your inspiring love for family.
card.author: Briel

card.note: Harris, you are a mench!
card.author: Mark Jacobson

card.note: Harris, we have worked together now for about 27 years. It was great walking into SGJB for my interview and from the doorway, I heard you call my name. Yes, it made me smile. I wish you all the best in your retirement! Happy Father's Day Harris...my almost Step-Dad! xo
card.author: Aaryn Lamos

card.note: Please keep in touch and share all your worldly adventures!
card.author: Aaryn Lamos

card.note: Harris, There is more than just one thing I like about you--you are a kind and thoughtful man, kind and thoughtful to relatives and friends, never forgetting to send cards and gifts on holidays and birthdays and never forgetting to remind me not to forget!/R
card.author: Love, Beverly

card.note: I like my Grandfather's wit and sense of humor! He's very funny.
card.author: Lance

card.note: I like many things about my Dad! His sense of humor and ability to laugh at himself. His passion for the things he believes in ….just to name a few, but I LOVE that he never gave up on me and our relationship! Love you Dad with all my heart!
card.author: Gia

card.note: You are a lovable cousin who loves travel, adventure and family. I love your zest for life and your loyalty toward your loved ones!
card.author: Paul Burditch

card.note: He is just like Burt Reynolds. He can be a cold rugged action figure type, as well as a wisecracking "Good Ole Boy". He's honest and mysterious, but also has a humble flair. I'm proud to know him as my Grandfather in hopes that my inheritance will grow just a lil more.
card.author: Shane

card.note: Grandpa is funny….. in a weird funny way.
card.author: Cody

card.note: Harris's sense of humor….hands down! =)
card.author: Edgar

card.note: He has been a father figure to me and has entrusted me with one of his most valuable treasures….his guns! LOL Oh, his daughter too!
card.author: Shawn

card.note: Harris, you are such a kind, caring person - and a special grandfather! You still get your nails done! What grandfather shares that with his granddaughters?! We love your funny and entertaining stories. We love you! Hope you have a special and very Happy Father's Day.
card.author: Donna, Scott, Danielle and Morgan
